title: Google camera app photos fine video awful
content:
Hey people after updating to Android 11 and the subsequent updates to the camera app taking photographs appears normal but if I choose to tap to keep focus this works if I do the same for something that is moving then it becomes hit or miss the app struggles to focus on what I select for it to focus on video is terrible video is terrible can't keep focus at all in focus out of focus a blurred mess android 11 awful every day here are some of the problems I've had they change daily 
Bizarre battery drain 
Currently experiencing weird issues using my phone in landscape mode
Missing features in YouTube 
People can't hear me in phone call this seems to have been fixed but I'm gonna wait and see
The clock app is causing weird crashing to my home screen
Not getting notifications from Gmail 
Sound in videos on YouTube can be all over the place from downright awful to one channel is way lower than the other 
Missing call recorder function in Google dialer app 

This just goes on and on is there any solution to the camera app or any solutions for this god awful android 11
